```{r univoltine_butterfly}
view(univoltine_butterfly)

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data=univoltine_butterfly, aes(forewing_length))+
  geom_density(aes(colour=sex)) + xlab("sex")+
  ggtitle("The length of male and female butterfly wings")+
  scale_colour_manual(values=c("#a4c639", "#E69F00", "#e32636", "#0000FF"))
